code: import _toConsumableArray from"/Users/shahriar/Downloads/Dev_Insta-master/client/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray";import{SET_ALERT,REMOVE_ALERT}from'../actions/types';var initialState=[];function alertReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;var type=action.type,payload=action.payload;switch(type){case SET_ALERT:return[].concat(_toConsumableArray(state),[payload]);case REMOVE_ALERT:return state.filter(function(alert){return alert.id!==payload;});default:return state;}}export default alertReducer;
